name: A way home (Ambear1337)
description:
A game where u need to help penguin Toru get home to his parents! Unstable is weather! Enjoy!

Controls:

WASD / Arrows - move.

There is no sounds or music in game, unfortunately, so you can turn on your music and play with it!

2D graphics - yanv_el (instagram - @yanv_el)
Programmer - ambear1337 (instagram - @ambear1337)
